scripts.build: npm run-script build-allauth && npm run-script compile-sass && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.build-main: npx sass -I static/css -s compressed static/css/style.sass static/css/style.css
scripts.build-main:watch: npx sass --watch -I static/css -s compressed static/css/style.sass static/css/style.css
scripts.build-emails: npx sass -I static/css -s compressed emails/static/emails/style/style.sass emails/static/emails/style/style.css
scripts.build-emails:watch: npx sass --watch -I static/css -s compressed emails/static/emails/style/style.sass emails/static/emails/style/style.css
